This page serves as a guide to many of the useful '''websites''' concerning [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and his [[Index:Writings by J.R.R. Tolkien|works]]. It is also an archive to many of the websites lost in the past.

==Official associations==
===Tolkien Estate===
*[[Tolkien Estate]] — https://www.tolkienestate.com/
*[[Tolkien Trust]] — https://www.tolkientrust.org/

===Publishers===
*[[HarperCollins]] — https://www.harpercollins.com/blogs/authors/jrr-tolkien
**HarperCollins UK — https://harpercollins.co.uk/blogs/authors/jrr-tolkien
*[[Houghton Mifflin Harcourt]] —
*[[Bodleian Library]] — https://archives.bodleian.ox.ac.uk

*Oxford
